response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and the importance of this investment to your organization. We are confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 11000}
